FuncDef:
The transceiver non-certified status-alarm enable command enables alarm reporting for non-certified optical module's status.
The undo transceiver non-certified status-alarm enable command enable alarm reporting for non-certified optical module's status.
By default, non-certified optical module's alarm is not reported.
Examples: Warning: This command enables the function of reporting status alarms of third-party optical modules. If a problem or defect occurs when a third-party optical module is used, Huawei does not take any responsibility. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When a non-certified optical module is installed on an interface, you can run this command to configure whether to report a non-certified optical module status alarm.
